title: We are hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with solid hands-on experience in digital advertising.
job_overview:
We are hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with solid hands-on experience in digital advertising.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month (depending on experience and results)

Job Scope:

Manage advertising campaigns on Google Ads and Meta (Facebook) Ads.

Monitor key performance metrics and optimize campaigns regularly.

Work fully remote with flexible working hours.

Requirements:

At least 1 year running Google or Facebook Ads campaigns.

Results-oriented, analytical mindset.

Ability to work independently and manage deadlines.
